#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
long long t,a;
scanf("%lld",&t);
while(t--)
{
long long x,y,q;
scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&x,&y,&q);
long long l,m,n,d;
l=x+y;
m=y-x;
n=((2*q)/l);
printf("%lld\n",n);
d=(m/(n-5));
long long  f=x-(2*d);
int series=1;
while(series<=n)
{
a=(f+(series-1)*d);
printf("%lld ",a);
series++;
}
printf("\n");
}
return 0;
}
